original_title: Even Fake Flowers Have Scent on Happy Days
overview: This film follows the protagonist, from a small town in Punjab, who knows he doesn't belong here but has accepted it during his relationship with a tape recorder. How the idea of a listener can be more important than who's listening. And what exactly can be the future of a place or an individual that can see their decay and accept it?
title: Even Fake Flowers Have Scent on Happy Days
